name: PONG Java Edition
description:
//Robatortas//

A small 1 week project I made a while back

as the title suggests, it's Pong, the classic game that made games.

But with a menu and some nice simple graphics.

The menu is what took me the most lmao.

Enjoy this small java game.

You need java to play this game btw.

-Robatortas
